text: Yiniharule tapa'isita kiÞyamatako sambandhama prasna gardachanh ki ‘‘yo kahile a'unecha’’? Tapa'ile bhanidinush ki ‘‘yasako jnana matra mero palanakartasamga cha’’. Atah allaha baheka aru kasaile tyasala'i tyasako samaya prakatagarna sakdaina. Tyo akasa ra dhartima atyanta thulo (ghatana) hunecha ra tyo ekkasi timimathi a'ilagnecha. Uniharu tapa'isita yasa prakara sodhchan jasto ki tyasako barema tapa'ila'i ramrari thaha cha. Bhanidinush yasako jnana khasa allahasita nai cha, tara yo kura dheraile bujhdainan
